Summarise Rainfall by Month

Source: R/summarise_rainfall_monthly.R
summarise_rainfall_monthly.Rd

Returns monthly total rainfall from daily data, ensuring all months are present.

Usage

summarise_rainfall_monthly(df)

Arguments

df

Data frame with columns Date and Rain_mm.

Value

A tibble with columns Year, Month, Rain_mm.

Examples

data(weather_nl)
summarise_rainfall_monthly(weather_nl)
#> # A tibble: 192 × 3
#>     Year Month Rain_mm
#>    <int> <int>   <dbl>
#>  1  2008     1    75.7
#>  2  2008     2    70.6
#>  3  2008     3   103. 
#>  4  2008     4   105  
#>  5  2008     5   119. 
#>  6  2008     6   129. 
#>  7  2008     7   107. 
#>  8  2008     8   123. 
#>  9  2008     9    67.6
#> 10  2008    10   134. 
#> # ℹ 182 more rows
